name: UIKeyInput
desc: A set of methods a responder uses to implement simple text entry.

items.name: func insertText(String)
items.desc: Inserts a character into the displayed text.

items.name: func deleteBackward()
items.desc: Deletes a character from the displayed text.

items.name: var hasText: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the text-entry object has any text.
